sentences.en: A police clampdown on car thieves hit a snag when villains stole one of their cars.
sentences.cn: 警方打击偷车贼的行动遭遇了一点小挫折：匪徒偷走了一辆警车。

sentences.en: A snag can provide food and a habitat for insects and birds.
sentences.cn: 残株可以为昆虫和鸟类提供食物和栖息地.
她被一条树根绊住了雪鞋.

sentences.en: Diplomatic efforts to end the fighting in Lebanon have hit another snag.
sentences.cn: 结束黎巴嫩之战的外交努力再次受挫.

sentences.en: Early on, he wrote software to snag expiring names on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 早些时期, 他编写软件去廉价地抢注域名.

sentences.en: I have a snag in my best black tights.
sentences.cn: 我最好的一条黑裤袜给划破了.

sentences.en: It is to be expected that an experiment will sometimes run into a snag at first.
sentences.cn: 开始试验时有时不很顺手,也是很自然的.

sentences.en: It’s an interesting job. The only snag is that it’s not very well paid.
sentences.cn: 这是一份有趣的工作，唯一的缺憾是工资不高。

sentences.en: Problems easily solved. Immediate solutions - to any question or - _ - snag thatmight come _ up.
sentences.cn: __轻松解决问题,对可能出现的任何问题或障碍都能直接解决.

sentences.en: The main snag about indexation lay in the indexation of wages.
sentences.cn: 指数化的主要障碍在于薪资的指数化.

sentences.en: The only snag could be securing a work permit.
sentences.cn: 唯一的障碍只在于获得一份劳工证.

sentences.en: The only snag is that I have no money.
The only snag is, I can't afford it!
sentences.cn: 惟一的困难是, 我付不起这钱!

sentences.en: There must be a snag in It'somewhere.
sentences.cn: 一定是在某处出了个小故障.

sentences.en: Would you please draw together the snag in my cuff?
sentences.cn: 请你把我袖口上的裂口缝上好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Your love life may a snag for two reasons.
sentences.cn: 你的爱情生活会因为两个愿意而触礁.

words.tran_cn: 抓住机会；造成阻碍；清除障碍物

trans.tran_cn: 小困难或障碍，突出物，钩丝
trans.tran_en: a problem or disadvantage, especially one that is not very serious, which you had not expected

trans.tran_cn: 抓住机会；造成阻碍；清除障碍物
